sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useScrollAnimation } from '../hooks/useScrollAnimation'; import './Papers.css'; const Papers = () => { const [ref, isVisible] = useScrollAnimation(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('abstract'); const [expandedGuideline, setExpandedGuideline] = useState(null); const downloadTemplate = (format, type) => { // Create download functionality for templates const templates = { abstract: { word: '/templates/abstract-template.docx', pdf: '/templates/abstract-template.pdf' }, paper: { word: '/templates/paper-template.docx', pdf: '/templates/paper-template.pdf' } }; const link = document.createElement('a'); link.href = templates[type][format]; link.download = `${type}-template.${format === 'word' ? 'docx' : 'pdf'}`; document.body.appendChild(link); link.click(); document.body.removeChild(link); }; const topics = [ "Drug Discovery & Development", "Pharmaceutical Nanotechnology", "Clinical Pharmacy & Therapeutics", "Pharmacovigilance & Drug Safety", "Regulatory Affairs & Quality Assurance", "Phytopharmaceuticals & Natural Products", "Pharmaceutical Biotechnology", "Pharmacoeconomics & Health Outcomes", "Digital Health & AI in Pharmacy", "Personalized Medicine" ]; return (

Call for Papers

Submit your research for UPHARMORA - 1.0

{/* Interactive Tabs */}
{/* Tab Content */}
{activeTab === 'abstract' && (
📄

Abstract Submission

Submit your research abstract for consideration at UPHARMORA - 1.0. Abstracts should clearly present your research objectives, methodology, and key findings.

Requirements:

  • 250-300 words maximum
  • Original research work
  • Clear methodology description
  • Significant findings or expected outcomes
  • Keywords (3-5 words)

Download Templates:

)} {activeTab === 'paper' && (
📚

Full Length Paper Submission

Submit complete research papers with detailed analysis, comprehensive results, and thorough discussion of findings.

Requirements:

  • 6-8 pages maximum (including references)
  • IEEE format strictly required
  • Original research with novel contributions
  • Comprehensive literature review
  • Statistical analysis where applicable
  • Ethical approval for clinical studies

Download Templates:

)}
{/* Interactive Guidelines */}

Submission Guidelines

setExpandedGuideline(expandedGuideline === 'dates' ? null : 'dates')} >

📅 Important Dates

{expandedGuideline === 'dates' ? '−' : '+'}
Abstract Deadline: December 15, 2024
Full Paper Deadline: December 31, 2024
Notification: January 15, 2025
Camera Ready: January 30, 2025
setExpandedGuideline(expandedGuideline === 'topics' ? null : 'topics')} >

🔬 Research Topics

{expandedGuideline === 'topics' ? '−' : '+'}
{topics.map((topic, index) => (
• {topic}
))}
setExpandedGuideline(expandedGuideline === 'review' ? null : 'review')} >

⚖️ Review Process

{expandedGuideline === 'review' ? '−' : '+'}
1 Initial Screening
2 Double-Blind Peer Review
3 Editorial Decision
4 Author Notification
{/* Call to Action */}

Ready to Submit?

Join leading researchers and contribute to the future of pharmaceutical sciences

); }; export default Papers;
